## Making Predictions 
::: {.r-stack}

```{python}
#| layout-ncol: 2
#| output-location: fragment

def show_double_result(func, obj1=s1, obj2=w1, width=500):
    if func == "dist":
        fig1 = obj1.plot_distributions()
        fig2 = obj2.plot_distributions()
    elif func == "z":
        fig1 = obj1.plot_zscore()
        fig2 = obj2.plot_zscore()
    elif func == "guess_nofilter":
        fig1 = obj1.plot_guesses(timedelta=1)
        fig2 = obj2.plot_guesses(timedelta=1)
    else:
        fig1 = obj1.plot_guesses()
        fig2 = obj2.plot_guesses()
    fig1.update_layout(autosize=False, width=width, height=500, showlegend=False)
    fig2.update_layout(autosize=False, width=width, height=500,)
    fig1.show()
    fig2.show()

show_double_result("dist")
```
